about_the_game:
In Marbleous!, the excitement of marble racing meets the thrill of creativity! Build custom tracks, choose your competitors, and watch up to 12 marbles compete for the podium in a vibrant display of color and motion.

Unleash your inner architect with Marbleous!’s track-building system! Design circuits with wild pieces, challenging curves, and thrilling jumps. Every race you create could become the next favorite among players!

With a wide range of marbles to choose from, you can select up to 12 unique competitors for each race. Featuring colorful and stylish designs, each competition is a showcase of speed and flair. Will your favorites make it to the top, or will there be a surprise finish?

Hit play and watch the magic happen! Marbles rolling, colliding, defying gravity, racing through each curve and obstacle in search of victory. If you're a fan of physics simulations, Marbleous! takes marble racing to a whole new level.

Place power-up capsules on your track, and watch the marbles do incredible acts like turning into a ghost to stop colliding with others or becoming a steel marble and increase their mass! 

Take your creations beyond the screen! With the track import/export tool, you can share your designs with friends and challenge them to beat your times. The fun multiplies when you swap your best tracks with other players!

Innovate with new designs, master advanced techniques, and create a collection of tracks that will be the dream challenge for marble racers everywhere! Will your track become the ultimate test for everyone?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64 bits Windows version and processor
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better (x86-64)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64 bits Windows version and processor
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better (x86-64)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card

short_description: Marbleous! is a relaxing, creative marble racing game! Design custom tracks, choose your marbles, and race through vibrant, physics-driven challenges. Build unique circuits, customize your marbles, and share your creations with friends for endless fun!
